name: Calmed by the Dark Aftermath
description:
Set 4 years after a catastrophic event, Calmed by the Dark Aftermath is a Open-World Action-RPG where, in a city corrupted by power, Kadmos has the mission to rescue a girl and fight a horde of vampires that control the city. Looking for a redemption, Kadmos must grow strong and obtain more powers as the player decide his fate.

Calmed by the Dark Aftermath features:

  • Action combat;
  • With different cutscenes, the player's actions will determine the fate of the story;
  • Multiple endings and New Game+;
  • Customize your car to participate in races;
  • Gain new powers to fight your enemies with the " Boost" system;
  • Find new routes by climbing  buildings;

Minimun System Requirements:

  • CPU: Intel Core 2 Duo E8400 or better
  • RAM: 4 GB
  • OS: WindowsR 7/8/8.1/10 (32bit/64bit)
  • VIDEO CARD: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • FREE DISK SPACE: 700 Mb
  • DISPLAY: 1280x768 or better

Calmed by the Dark Aftermath

Game developed in RPG Maker MV.
